commentary.comment: The referee blows his whistle and we are underway.
This is a yellow card! Timothy Weah (Paris SG) is not happy with the decision, but from our point of view it was clear.
A fine pass finds Christopher Nkunku (Paris SG) in space inside the box, he looks up and drills a low shot towards the middle of the goal, but the Brice Samba reacts superbly to deny him.
Julien Feret (Caen) violates the laws of the game and is shown a deserved yellow card by the referee.
Frederic Guilbert (Caen) infringed the rules and goes into the book. Antony Gautier pulls out a yellow card.
The referee blows his whistle for half-time, bringing to a close the first 45 minutes of the match.
Referee Antony Gautier blows his whistle to start the second half.
Unai Emery has decided to make a change. Yacine Adli (Paris SG) replaces Christopher Nkunku.
The game has come to an end for Marquinhos. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of Kevin Rimane (Paris SG).
That's a clear yellow card. Jessy Deminguet (Caen) goes into the book.
Nothing more will happen in this game as the referee blows for full time.
Here we go, today's match is starting right now.

Great solo effort from Nabil Fekir (Lyon)! He beat a couple of players and shot from the edge of the box, but the effort rose just over the bar. The ball goes out of play and Nice will have a goal kick.

Alassane Plea (Nice) meets a perfect cross from Mario Balotelli deep inside the box and controls it with a nice first touch. He produces a low shot into the middle of the goal. The score has changed to 0:1.
Benoit Bastien shows a yellow card to Mario Balotelli (Nice) for his blatant foul.

Bertrand Traore (Lyon) gathers a cross inside the box and strikes the ball. He wastes a great scoring opportunity as his shot only hits the right-hand post. The ball goes out of play and Nice will have a goal kick.
The game has begun to heat up. Jeremy Morel (Lyon) challenges an opponent and receives a deserved yellow card for his ugly tackle.
The match has reached half-time.
Referee Benoit Bastien blows his whistle to start the second half.
The need to improve in the second half has brought about a change. Tanguy Ndombele comes off for Mariano Diaz (Lyon).
Goal - 1:1! Nabil Fekir tees up Memphis Depay (Lyon) inside the box and he rolls the ball into the bottom left corner and past Walter Benitez.
Walter Benitez (Nice) gets a yellow card.

Mario Balotelli (Nice) has a great chance inside the box following a rebound off a defender, but somehow he gets underneath the ball and it flies high over the bar. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Lyon.
Memphis Depay (Lyon) proves that he is an excellent free-kick taker after finding the back of the net with a clever shot that goes straight into the bottom left corner!
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Alassane Plea (Nice) was quite harsh and Benoit Bastien didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
Rafael (Lyon) violates the laws of the game and is shown a deserved yellow card by the referee.
This is a yellow card! Jordan Ferri (Lyon) is not happy with the decision, but from our point of view it was clear.
We are about to witness a subsitution. Mickael Le Bihan (Nice) for Adrien Tameze.
The game has come to an end for Allan Saint-Maximin. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of Bassem Srarfi (Nice).
Bruno Genesio has decided to substitute Rafael and he is replaced by Fernando Marcal (Lyon).
Substitution. Nabil Fekir is replaced by Jordan Ferri (Lyon).
GOAL - 3:1! Bertrand Traore found Memphis Depay (Lyon) inside the box, he spotted goalkeeper Walter Benitez off his line and chipped the ball into the net. What a cheeky lob!
Goal! Maxime Le Marchand plays a short, square pass into the path of Alassane Plea (Nice), who bends a shot straight into the bottom left corner to make it 3:2. Fabulous goal!
That's the end of the match.
Today's match has just started, enjoy the game!

Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) misses a good chance to score. An inch-perfect cross into the box finds Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar. It will be a corner kick for Marseille.
Morgan Sanson (Marseille) connects with a pass inside the box and slams home into the top right corner. The goalkeeper was helpless.
Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) rises above the opponent's defence and heads a precise cross towards the roof of the net. His effort, however, is blocked by Regis Gurtner, who pulls off a stunning save!
Goal! Konstantinos Mitroglou (Marseille) is quickest to react to the rebound and stabs the ball into the back of the net. It's 2:0.
Moussa Konate (Amiens SC) scores as he latches on to a pass inside the penalty box and fires a perfect low shot that goes into the middle of the goal and past the goalkeeper.
Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) is first to the rebound but his shot is blocked. Wow, what an escape there for the opposition.
The first half of today's match has just finished.
The second half has just started.
Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) wastes a huge opportunity. He attempts to knock a rebound into the middle of the goal with a delicate header, but Regis Gurtner dives to keep the ball from hitting the net.
Thomas Monconduit (Amiens SC) makes a horror tackle on his opponent and receives a red card from the referee! A free kick has been awarded to Marseille.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Mathieu Bodmer (Amiens SC) comes onto the pitch for Serge Gakpe.
Rudi Garcia has decided to make a change. Valere Germain (Marseille) replaces Konstantinos Mitroglou.
The manager makes a subsitution with Quentin Cornette (Amiens SC) coming on for Moussa Konate.
It's time for a substitution. That's the last involvement from Rolando as he is replaced by Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa (Marseille).
Christophe Pelissier decides to make a substitution. Gael Kakuta will be replaced by Harisson Manzala (Amiens SC).
Substitution. Jordan Amavi (Marseille) in, Florian Thauvin out.
The referee blows his whistle for the final time to end this match.
The first half has just begun.

A defence-splitting pass is taken in his stride by Youri Tielemans (Monaco) in the box. Without even looking up he drills a shot towards the middle of the goal, but Erwin Zelazny pulls off an easy save.
Goal! Rony Lopes (Monaco) fires the rebound into the middle of the goal after the ball breaks to him in the box. The score is 0:1.
A loose pass is instantly latched onto by Youri Tielemans (Monaco). He tries his luck from the edge of the box with a measured shot, but it hits the crossbar and is cleared to safety.
There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Clement Turpin has ended it.
The second half has just started.
It will be a substitution. Bryan Pele (Troyes) is ready to enter the pitch as Chaouki Ben Saada walks off.
Christophe Herelle (Troyes) is yellow-carded for breaking the rules of the game.
Rony Lopes (Monaco) receives a brilliant pass and fires a powerful long-range daisy-cutter into the bottom right corner. It couldn't have gone in a better place.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Benjamin Nivet trots off the pitch and is replaced by Adama Niane (Troyes).
Leonardo Jardim has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Falcao (Monaco) replacing Moussa Sylla.
The referee allows time for a substitution. Hyun-Jun Suk will be replaced by Bryan Mbeumo (Troyes).
Substitution. Djibril Sidibe is replaced by Almamy Toure (Monaco).
Falcao (Monaco) misses a good chance to score. An inch-perfect cross into the box finds Falcao (Monaco) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar.

Thomas Lemar (Monaco) is first to the rebound but his shot is blocked. Wow, what an escape there for the opposition. Monaco have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Rony Lopes (Monaco) was quite harsh and Clement Turpin didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
Rony Lopes comes off the pitch to be replaced by Jordi Mboula (Monaco).
Jordi Mboula (Monaco) received a pass and blasted a beautiful rocket of a shot from just outside the penalty area into the top left corner. He was given an ovation. Excellent finish.
That's the end of the match.
The match has just started.
The game is interrupted because of a yellow card that is shown to Julien Serrano (Monaco).
Kevin Theophile-Catherine (St Etienne) receives a yellow card.
The match has reached half-time.
The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.
It will be a substitution. Romain Hamouma (St Etienne) is ready to enter the pitch as Paul Ntep de Madiba walks off.
Jean-Louis Gasset decides to make a substitution. Assane Diousse will be replaced by Kevin Monnet-Paquet (St Etienne).
Substitution. Almamy Toure is replaced by Djibril Sidibe (Monaco).
Jean-Louis Gasset prepares a substitution. Silva Gabriel is replaced by Ole Selnaes (St Etienne).
Rony Lopes goes off the pitch and Rachid Ghezzal (Monaco) comes on.
Djibril Sidibe (Monaco) takes the chance to have an effort at goal from inside the box but misses to the right of the target.
Leonardo Jardim has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Pietro Pellegri (Monaco) replacing Youri Tielemans.
Thomas Lemar (Monaco) unleashes a mid-range direct free kick, but sees his strike well saved by the goalkeeper.
Kamil Glik (Monaco) fails to score from the rebound as the goalkeeper stops his effort from hitting the net.
Benoit Bastien blows his whistle. Mathieu Debuchy (St Etienne) commits a foul after dangerous play. It's a penalty for Monaco!
Fabinho (Monaco) takes the penalty and scores! He buries the ball into the bottom the right corner!
The referee blows for the end of today's match.
Benoit Bastien shows a yellow card to Rachid Ghezzal (Monaco) for his unsportsmanlike behavior after the match has ended.
Unsportsmanlike conduct. Rachid Ghezzal (Monaco) is shown a red card off the pitch!
Today's match has just started, enjoy the game!
Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) is found in space by a decent pass, and he immediately hits a rocket of a shot at goal that clips the top of the crossbar.
Christopher Nkunku (Paris SG) runs onto a lofted ball into the box, but hits a weak shot towards the top of the goal that is easily dealt with by Tomas Koubek. Paris SG win a corner.
Jerome Brisard has ended the first half by blowing the whistle.
The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.
Presnel Kimpembe (Paris SG) earns the yellow card.
Thiago Motta (Paris SG) makes an unfair challenge by holding his opponent to prevent him from getting the ball. It's a penalty! Great chance to score for Rennes!
Goal! Benjamin Bourigeaud (Rennes) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past Kevin Trapp into the bottom right corner.
Here is a change. Christopher Nkunku is going off and Unai Emery gives the last tactical orders to Julian Draxler (Paris SG).
It is time for a substitution. Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) is on for Lassana Diarra.
GOAL! Adrien Hunou (Rennes) collects a pass and from inside the box he lifts the ball over Kevin Trapp, who was off his line. What a finish that is! 0:2.
Hamari Traore goes off the pitch and Ismaila Sarr (Rennes) comes on.
Unai Emery has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Javier Pastore (Paris SG) replacing Thiago Motta.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) rises above the defence and powers a header at the bottom left corner, but the goalkeeper denies him with a superb save.
Here comes a substitution. Sanjin Prcic is given a rest as he is replaced by Faitout Maouassa (Rennes).
That's all for today as the game is over.
Today's match has just started, enjoy the game!
Valere Germain (Marseille) leaps to meet a beautiful cross and produces a header which goes low inside the right post.
Goal! Lucas Ocampos swings the ball deep into the box and finds Florian Thauvin (Marseille) unmarked, and his close-range header flies past the keeper into the roof of the net. 0:2.
Amaury Delerue shows a yellow card to Clement Grenier (Guingamp) for a tough tackle.

A neat pass is well received by Lucas Deaux (Guingamp), who is lurking on the edge of the box and strikes the ball towards the left post, but the goalkeeper makes an incredible save to block his shot. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Guingamp.
Jimmy Briand (Guingamp) decided to surprise the goalkeeper with a quick shot from the edge of the box, but his effort crashes against the crossbar.
Goal 1:2! Clement Grenier (Guingamp) taps home from close range after the rebound fell kindly into his path.
The match has reached half-time.
The game restarts for the second half.
Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) touches the ball with his hand inside the box! A penalty is given to Guingamp!
Goal! Clement Grenier (Guingamp) puts the ball into the bottom right corner past the outstretched arm of Yohann Pele.
A yellow card for a tackle by Jeremy Sorbon (Guingamp). Amaury Delerue doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
Jimmy Briand (Guingamp) picks up a lucky rebound inside the box from the clearance, beats an opponent but drills his shot inches wide of the right post.
Clinton N'Jie (Marseille) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Maxime Lopez.
Steve Mandanda (Marseille) fouls an opponent. At least that's what referee Amaury Delerue signals. The referee makes a call and blows his whistle for an infringement. Guingamp are awarded a penalty.
A card of the red variety is shown to Steve Mandanda (Marseille). He has been sent off.
The manager is forced to make a substitution due to a red card. Rudi Garcia issues instructions to Yohann Pele (Marseille), who will replace Valere Germain.
Jimmy Briand (Guingamp) smoothly converts the penalty with a beautiful low drive into the left side of the net.
Substitution. Lucas Ocampos will be replaced by Bouna Sarr (Marseille).
Antoine Kombouare decides to make a substitution. Nicolas Benezet will be replaced by Marcus Coco (Guingamp).

What a wonderful finish! Florian Thauvin (Marseille) latches on to an inch-perfect cross into the box and smashes the ball inside the left post. There are not enough superlatives to describe that goal.
Gregory Sertic (Marseille) reacts well to latch onto a rebound inside the box, but his shot is well blocked.
Substitution. Yannis Salibur (Guingamp) replaces Lucas Deaux.
Antoine Kombouare prepares a substitution. Etienne Didot is replaced by Mustapha Diallo (Guingamp).
Florian Thauvin (Marseille) takes a short pass in his stride inside the box, but hits a poor shot at goal that goes high over the bar.
Christophe Kerbrat (Guingamp) finds himself free inside the box and pulls the trigger, but his effort is brilliantly stopped by one of the defending players.
The match has just finished.
The first half of this match is about to start.

CLOSE! Florian Thauvin (Marseille) shows off his amazing skills with a solo run to the edge of the box before fashioning a shot that goes inches wide of the left post! The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Nice.

Mario Balotelli (Nice) finishes his beautiful individual effort with a superb strike from inside the box. Steve Mandanda is just a bystander as the ball flies into the right side of the goal. The score is 0:1.
Excellent touch by Florian Thauvin (Marseille)! He latches on to a precise pass deep into the box and unleashes a low drive towards the left post, but the goalkeeper pulls off a terrific save.

Valere Germain (Marseille) wins the aerial battle and plants a header at goal from near the penalty after a good cross from Dimitri Payet. It's a fine attempt but sails narrowly wide of the left post. The ball goes out of play and Nice will have a goal kick.

It's a goal! Valere Germain (Marseille) scores with a brilliant low shot into the middle of the goal after being released inside the box by a superb lofted pass from Dimitri Payet. The score is now 1:1.

Florian Thauvin (Marseille) takes a wonderful touch after collecting a pass inside the box. He steers his shot towards the roof of the net, but the keeper makes a superb save! Marseille have been awarded a corner kick.
Boubacar Kamara (Marseille) receives a yellow card for a nasty tackle.
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Mario Balotelli (Nice) was quite harsh and Antony Gautier didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
The match has reached half-time.
Everything is set for the start of the second half.
Half-time substitution. Rudi Garcia decided to make a change. Rolando is replaced by Gregory Sertic (Marseille).
That will be all from Florian Thauvin who is being replaced by the fresh legs of Clinton N'Jie (Marseille).
Goal! Clinton N'Jie puts the ball across the area and Dimitri Payet (Marseille) has the easiest task in the world to tuck the ball into an empty net. 2:1.
The substitution is prepared. Bassem Srarfi (Nice) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Allan Saint-Maximin.
Lucien Favre prepares a substitution. Mario Balotelli is replaced by Mickael Le Bihan (Nice).
It will be a substitution. Morgan Sanson (Marseille) is ready to enter the pitch as Boubacar Kamara walks off.
Nice have a goal ruled out for offside!
That's the end of the match.
The match has just started.

Quentin Cornette (Amiens SC) collects a great pass inside the box and misses a golden opportunity. His low shot was directed into the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper does well to stop his effort.
Angel Di Maria (Paris SG) latches onto a long ball into the box and unleashes a fine volley at goal, but flashes the effort just wide of the left post. That would have been a great goal!
Fantastic team goal! Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) was set free in the area by Javier Pastore and he made no mistake with a lovely finish into the bottom left corner. 0:1.
A pass into the box finds Angel Di Maria (Paris SG) unmarked. He carefully places a shot towards the middle of the goal, but a brilliant last-ditch save by Regis Gurtner denies him.
The match has reached half-time.
Everything is set for the start of the second half.

Alphonse Areola was forced into action to thwart Moussa Konate (Amiens SC). He found himself some space after latching on to a pass and unleashed a shot to the bottom right corner but couldn't beat the keeper.
Moussa Konate (Amiens SC) receives a well-taken defence-splitting pass inside the box and scores! He buries the ball into the bottom left corner.
Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG) shoots after receiving a good pass. His effort from the edge of the box goes just wide of the right post.
Bongani Zungu (Amiens SC) is shown a yellow card by the referee for making a challenge on his opponent, but he looks angry with the decision.
Christopher Nkunku (Paris SG) finds some space just outside the penalty area after exchanging the ball with his teammate and strikes a shot towards goal that goes inside the right post!
Here comes a substitution. Quentin Cornette is given a rest as he is replaced by Serge Gakpe (Amiens SC).
Substitution. Thomas Monconduit makes way for Guessouma Fofana (Amiens SC).
Substitution. Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) has come on for Thiago Motta.
Moussa Konate (Amiens SC) scores as he latches on to a pass inside the penalty box and fires a perfect low shot that goes into the middle of the goal and past the goalkeeper.
A substitution has been made. Harisson Manzala is replaced by Mathieu Bodmer (Amiens SC).
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Guessouma Fofana (Amiens SC) was quite harsh and Hakim Ben El Hadj didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Christopher Nkunku trots off the pitch and is replaced by Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG).
Angel Di Maria (Paris SG) had a great opportunity from mid-range. His powerful volley was directed towards the middle of the goal, but Regis Gurtner was alert and made an astonishing save!
Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) is furious with himself as he misses a golden opportunity from inside the six-yard box. He sends a rebound a few inches wide of the left post.
The referee blows his whistle for the final time to end this match.
The referee blows his whistle and we are underway.

What a chance that is! Felix Eboa Eboa swings the ball into the box, and Marcus Thuram (Guingamp) gets in front of his man and powers his header just wide of the left post. The ball goes out of play and Paris SG will have a goal kick.

Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG) latched on to an accurate pass deep into the box and attempted to fire the ball past the keeper, but the shot is way off target. What a miskick! The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Guingamp.
Nicolas Benezet (Guingamp) misses a good chance to score. An inch-perfect cross into the box finds Nicolas Benezet (Guingamp) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar.
Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) connects with the corner kick around the penalty spot, but steers his header just wide of the right post. The ball goes out of play and Guingamp will have a goal kick.
Goal! Ludovic Blas (Guingamp) shows perfect technique and produces a first-time effort from just outside the box that goes into the top left corner. It's 0:1.
There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Sebastien Moreira has ended it.
Everything is set for the start of the second half.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Julian Draxler departs the field of play to be replaced by Javier Pastore (Paris SG).
Gooal! No wait, it's been ruled out for offside. Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) disagrees, but the linesman is sure about his call.
Here is a change. Thiago Motta is going off and Unai Emery gives the last tactical orders to Christopher Nkunku (Paris SG).
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Thomas Meunier (Paris SG) comes onto the pitch for Angel Di Maria.

Goal! Clement Grenier displays great vision and sends a pass to Jimmy Briand (Guingamp), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball from close range in the back of the net. The score is 0:2.
Thiago Silva (Paris SG) is punished with a yellow card for violating the rules.
Jimmy Briand (Guingamp) jumps into a tackle and Sebastien Moreira blows his whistle for a foul. Paris SG are given a penalty!
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) will take the responsibility and he is already preparing the ball.
Goal! Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past Karl-Johan Johnsson into right side of the goal.
It is time for a substitution. Lebogang Phiri (Guingamp) is on for Christophe Kerbrat.
Goal! Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) ran onto a clever lofted pass from Thomas Meunier and easily beat the keeper with a header into the bottom right corner from close range. 2:2.
It's time for a substitution. That's the last involvement from Ludovic Blas as he is replaced by Pedro Rebocho (Guingamp).
A yellow card for a tackle by Thomas Meunier (Paris SG). Sebastien Moreira doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
Substitution. Jimmy Briand makes his way off the pitch and Mustapha Diallo (Guingamp) comes on as his replacement.
That's all for today as the game is over.
The match has just started.
Goal! Florian Thauvin (Marseille) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past Ludovic Butelle into right side of the goal.

Flavien Tait (Angers) picks up a pass on the edge of the box and manages to get a powerful shot away, forcing the goalkeeper to scramble to his left and palm the ball away. Corner kick. Angers will have an opportunity.
Nicolas Rainville shows a yellow card to Bouna Sarr (Marseille) for his blatant foul.
Flavien Tait (Angers) stands over the resultant free kick from mid-range, but his shot goes just over the crossbar. It could have been a fantastic goal!
Yohann Pele pulls off a great save to deny Karl Toko Ekambi (Angers), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick shot to the left side of the goal.

Flavien Tait (Angers) wasted a huge opportunity! The fans already began to celebrate as he produced a shot from the edge of the box after a brilliant solo effort. The ball went towards the right side of the goal, but Yohann Pele made an astonishing save!
That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.
The second half gets underway.

Jordan Amavi (Marseille) picks up the ball, dribbles to the edge of the penalty area and unleashes a brilliant shot to the bottom left corner, but is thwarted by a great save from Ludovic Butelle. The ball is out of play and Marseille manage to earn a corner.

Florian Thauvin (Marseille) produces a ferocious strike from the edge of the box. His dangerous effort towards the roof of the net is blocked by Ludovic Butelle, who pulls off a superb save to keep the ball out of the net. The ball goes out of play. Marseille are awarded a corner kick.
Rudi Garcia has decided to substitute Florian Thauvin and he is replaced by Rolando (Marseille).
The manager makes a subsitution with Dimitri Payet (Marseille) coming on for Valere Germain.
Karl Toko Ekambi (Angers) receives a yellow card from the referee as expected.
Great chance! Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) collects a great pass inside the box, but the goalkeeper does well to stop his effort.
Pierrick Capelle comes off the pitch to be replaced by Thomas Toure (Angers).
Close! Thomas Mangani (Angers) is a whisker away from finishing-off the move he started. His close-range effort flies just over the bar.
Yohann Pele (Marseille) is given a fully deserved yellow card.

Prince Oniangue (Angers) was in a good shooting position inside the six-yard box and produced a first-time shot towards the inside of the left post, but the goalkeeper made an astonishing save to thwart him. Angers win a corner.
GOAL! Flavien Tait curls the free kick into the box. Ismael Traore (Angers) peels off his marker and arrows a brilliant header past Yohann Pele and into the right side of the net. 1:1.
Today's match ends for Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa who will be replaced by Konstantinos Mitroglou (Marseille).
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Flavien Tait leaves the pitch and Wilfried Kanga Aka (Angers) comes on.
Luiz Gustavo (Marseille) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Nicolas Rainville had an easy-decision to make.
The match has just finished.
Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
Giovanni Sio (Montpellier) sends a rebound goalwards, low to the right-hand post, but the goalkeeper stretches to stop it.
Goal - 0:1! Remy Cabella laid the ball off to Romain Hamouma (St Etienne), who shot from close range low into the back of the net, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.
Pedro Mendes (Montpellier) collects a wonderful lead pass and as he has a lot of space, smashes a terrific shot from long range. His shot goes painfully close to the crossbar!
Stephane Ruffier (St Etienne) is given a yellow card.
Kevin Theophile-Catherine (St Etienne) brings his opponent down. Thomas Leonard has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle for a foul. Penalty! A huge opportunity to score for Montpellier.
Giovanni Sio (Montpellier) wastes a huge opportunity to score from the penalty spot. He attempts to slot into the bottom left corner, but Stephane Ruffier pulls off a superb save.
The referee blows his whistle to end the first half and the players are now heading to their respective dressing rooms.
The second half gets underway.
Nicolas Cozza (Montpellier) takes a first-time shot inside the box after latching onto a nice lofted pass, but the effort is blocked and spins away to safety.
Michel Der Zakarian prepares a substitution. Nicolas Cozza is replaced by Keagan Dolly (Montpellier).
We are about to witness a substitution. Jonathan Bamba (St Etienne) is replacing Robert Beric.
Remy Cabella (St Etienne) takes a brilliant touch after he latches on to a pass on the edge of the box and strikes the ball to the bottom right corner. The goalkeeper dives low and saves his attempt.

The ball rebounds outside of the penalty area and falls to Keagan Dolly (Montpellier) who directs his shot to the top right corner, but the keeper is there in time to stop his effort. Montpellier force their opponents to concede a corner.

A defence-splitting pass is taken in his stride by Remy Cabella (St Etienne) in the box. Without even looking up he drills a shot towards the right side of the goal, but Benjamin Lecomte pulls off a brilliant save. Good work from St Etienne as they win a corner.
Michel Der Zakarian is forced to make a change. Nordi Mukiele is unable to continue due to injury, Solomon Sambia (Montpellier) comes on.
Romain Hamouma goes off the pitch and Paul Ntep de Madiba (St Etienne) comes on.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Isaac Mbenza (Montpellier) comes onto the pitch for Casimir Ninga.

Ellyes Skhiri (Montpellier) is the first to get to the rebound and quickly sends it back towards goal. One of the opponents gets in way of his effort and deflects the ball onto the post. Montpellier force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.
Substitution. Remy Cabella leaves the pitch and is replaced by Assane Diousse (St Etienne).
Paul Ntep de Madiba (St Etienne) argues strongly with the referee and is awarded a yellow card. A needless yellow card!
That's it for today, Thomas Leonard has blown his whistle and the game is over.
Today's match has just started, enjoy the game!

Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG) places a shot from the edge of the box towards the left side of the goal, but Benoit Costil makes a terrific save to deny him. Nice play all round! Now Paris SG have a corner.
A weak shot from the edge of the box by Martin Braithwaite (Bordeaux) is easily saved by Alphonse Areola. Bordeaux force a corner. They send men into the box.
Chance! Dani Alves sends a brilliant curling cross into the heart of the defence and into the path of Edinson Cavani (Paris SG), whose header from the centre of the box goes a whisker over the bar.
Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) finds space inside the box to shoot after collecting a short pass, but it's a wasted effort as it flies high over the bar.

It's time for a substitution. Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) comes on in place of Angel Di Maria.

Christopher Nkunku (Paris SG) dribbled past his opponents before finding himself in a great position to strike. His attempt from just outside of the box went towards the left side of the goal, but it wasn't dangerous and Baptiste Reynet made a comfortable save.
Olivier Dall'Oglio has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Florent Balmont (Dijon) replacing Xeka.

Goal! Neymar (Paris SG) weaves his way past opponents, and he unleashes a magnificent effort from the edge of the box into the bottom left corner. Baptiste Reynet had no chance of reaching it. The score is 6:0.
Neymar feeds the ball through to Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG), who picks up the pass inside the box and quickly sends it into the left side of the goal! The goalkeeper was helpless. 7:0!
Substitution. Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) on for Giovani Lo Celso.
Olivier Thual blows his whistle for a foul after Cedric Yambere (Dijon) hacks down one of his opponents. The referee blows his whistle and awards Paris SG a penalty after chaos inside the box.
Goal! Neymar (Paris SG) runs up to the ball, stops and waits for Baptiste Reynet to commit before slotting the penalty into the left of the goal.

Christopher Nkunku (Paris SG) escapes his marker to connect with a cross and heads towards the top of the net, but the keeper pulls off an excellent save to deny him. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Paris SG will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

Neymar (Paris SG) latches on to a precise pass and finds himself one-on-one with the keeper. He fires a low shot towards the right side of the net, but Baptiste Reynet leaps like a salmon to deny him.
Nothing more will happen in this game as the referee blows for full time.
The referee blows his whistle and we are underway.
Goal! A great through ball by Edinson Cavani sets up Angel Di Maria (Paris SG) inside the box, and he makes no mistake and bangs the ball into the bottom left corner. 0:1.
Marco Verratti (Paris SG) takes his opponent down and receives a yellow card from the referee.
Tony Chapron shows a yellow card to Diego Carlos (Nantes) for his blatant foul.

Ciprian Tatarusanu doesn't have to worry about this one. Edinson Cavani plays a pass into the feet of Angel Di Maria (Paris SG), who is unable to find the target as his effort from inside the box goes high over the bar.
Nicolas Pallois (Nantes) receives a harsh yellow card from the referee after committing a minor foul on his opponent.
Tony Chapron has ended the first half by blowing the whistle.
The half-time break is over and the second half is about to start.
Santos Silva Diego (Nantes) powers a header just wide of the right post following a cross into the middle of the box. The ball goes out of play and Paris SG will have a goal kick.
Kylian Mbappe rounds off a good move with a layoff to Angel Di Maria (Paris SG) inside the box, he has a clear sight of goal but sends the ball just wide of the left post.
Dani Alves (Paris SG) has tested the patience of referee Tony Chapron and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
GOAL DISALLOWED! Controversy and anger as Emiliano Sala (Nantes) has a goal ruled out, incredibly, for offside.
Yacine Bammou is not able to continue due to his injury and will be replaced by Jules Iloki (Nantes).
Unai Emery decides to make a substitution. Edinson Cavani will be replaced by Thomas Meunier (Paris SG).
A substitution has been made. Andrei Girotto is replaced by Santy Ngom (Nantes).
The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Christopher Nkunku (Paris SG) comes onto the pitch so that Angel Di Maria can be given a rest.
Claudio Ranieri prepares a substitution. Leo Dubois is replaced by Adrien Thomasson (Nantes).
Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) volleys the ball towards the right side of the goal, but the goalkeeper makes a brilliant save to keep the ball out.
Santos Silva Diego (Nantes) receives a second yellow card and is sent off.
Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) hit the left post with his blast from close range after receiving a cross from the resulting free kick.
That's it for today, Tony Chapron has blown his whistle and the game is over.
The referee blows his whistle and we are underway.
Jeremy Morel (Lyon) brings down his opponent with a very late tackle. It's a penalty! Angers have an opportunity to score from the penalty spot.
Goal! Karl Toko Ekambi (Angers) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past Anthony Lopes into the bottom left corner.
Lucas Tousart (Lyon) has tested the patience of referee Frank Schneider and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
Karl Toko Ekambi (Angers) wastes a golden opportunity from inside the six-yard box after firing the ball a few inches over the crossbar.
Fernando Marcal (Lyon) came close to scoring but should have done much better. His poor attempt from close range ended up in the gloves of Ludovic Butelle.
Flavien Tait (Angers) is cautioned by the referee for a foul that he committed a little earlier.
Abdoulaye Bamba (Angers) fouls his opponent and receives a yellow card from the referee, but he is clearly not happy with the decision.
Karl Toko Ekambi (Angers) fires a shot at goal from a very promising position outside the penalty area, but it is blocked by a self-sacrificing defender.
The referee demonstrates he won't tolerate this behaviour. Angelo Fulgini (Angers) is given a yellow card.
The first half of today's match has just finished.
The whistle blows and Frank Schneider starts the second half.
Goal! Nabil Fekir (Lyon) pounced on a loose ball inside the box and beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the bottom left corner. He makes it 1:1.
Frank Schneider shows the yellow card to Rafael (Lyon) for a heavy challenge.
An accurate pass to the edge of the box is well taken by Karl Toko Ekambi (Angers), whose instinctive shot towards goal flashes inches wide of the right post.
Substitution. Pierrick Capelle will be replaced by Billy Ketkeophomphone (Angers).

Memphis Depay (Lyon) has a good opportunity as he meets a cross on the edge of the six-yard box and heads it towards the target. One of the defenders stands on the goal line and manages to keep the ball out.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Memphis Depay leaves the pitch and Tanguy Ndombele (Lyon) comes on.
Stephane Moulin prepares a substitution. Angelo Fulgini is replaced by Enzo Crivelli (Angers).
The substitution is prepared. Amine Gouiri (Lyon) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Myziane Maolida.
Houssem Aouar (Lyon) wasted a big chance to finish after the resulting free kick! He latched on to a well-placed cross deep inside the box and produced a fine header towards the net!
Substitution. Thomas Mangani makes way for Loic Puyo (Angers).
That was close. Amine Gouiri (Lyon) fires a shot from the edge of the box which goes a whisker wide of the right post.
Flavien Tait (Angers) must have known he would be sent off for this foul, but he had to stop the opponent at all costs. Frank Schneider shows him a second yellow card and the game has ended for him.
Tanguy Ndombele (Lyon) hits a good looking first-time shot from the edge of the box, but it goes narrowly over the bar.

Amine Gouiri (Lyon) gets inside the box and tries to beat Ludovic Butelle with a measured shot into the left side of the goal, but the keeper is equal to the effort and makes a fine save. The linesman points to the corner flag, Lyon are going to take it.
The match has just finished.
The first half has started.
Max Gradel (Toulouse) tried his luck from a long-range free kick, but the effort came back off the crossbar!
Problems for Jean-Louis Gasset as Vincent Pajot is not able to play anymore. His injury is too serious and Ole Selnaes (St Etienne) replaces him.
Leo Lacroix (St Etienne) goes close to scoring with a shot from inside the box, but he drags his effort wide of the left post.
Max Gradel (Toulouse) receives a yellow card.
Issa Diop (Toulouse) wins himself just enough space inside the box to connect with the corner. His header flies towards the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper blocks the effort.
Referee Mikael Lesage sees the trip by Andy Delort (Toulouse) and doesn't hesitate to blow his whistle. It's a penalty to St Etienne! Let's see who's going to take it.
A yellow card for a tackle by Andy Delort (Toulouse). Mikael Lesage doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
Goal! Robert Beric (St Etienne) puts the penalty low into the middle of the goal and past Alban Lafont.
The match has reached half-time.
Referee Mikael Lesage blows his whistle to start the second half.
Silva Gabriel (St Etienne) gets a yellow card. The referee Mikael Lesage made the right call.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Assane Diousse (St Etienne) replaces Romain Hamouma.
Substitution. Corentin Jean (Toulouse) in, Andy Delort out.
Robert Beric (St Etienne) is unlucky with a goal-bound effort from the edge of the box. A brilliant save by Alban Lafont stops the ball from hitting the bottom left corner.
Here comes a substitution. Yaya Sanogo (Toulouse) is brought on as a substitute for Gianelli Imbula.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Kevin Monnet-Paquet (St Etienne) comes onto the pitch for Robert Beric.
Here is a change. Somalia is going off and Pascal Dupraz gives the last tactical orders to Jimmy Durmaz (Toulouse).
Kevin Monnet-Paquet (St Etienne) came close to scoring. He connected with a pass inside the box and perhaps should have done better than direct his shot straight at Alban Lafont.
Bryan Dabo (St Etienne) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Mikael Lesage didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
Gooal! No wait, it's been ruled out for offside. Christopher Jullien (Toulouse) disagrees, but the linesman is sure about his call.
It's in the back of the net! Jonathan Bamba plays it into the box, and Assane Diousse (St Etienne) gets on the end of the cross to put it into the back of the net. 2:0.
Kelvin Amian (Toulouse) sees a yellow card from Mikael Lesage after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.
Nothing more will happen in this game as the referee blows for full time.
The first half has just begun.
Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) latched on to an accurate pass deep into the box and attempted to fire the ball past the keeper, but the shot is way off target. What a miskick!
A yellow card for a tackle by Stef Peeters (Caen). Karim Abed doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
Karim Abed shows a yellow card to Yuri Berchiche (Paris SG), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.
GOAL! Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) finishes off a sublime move with a delightful back-heel goal. Kylian Mbappe provided the assist with a brilliant pass. 1:0.
Close! Ronny Rodelin (Caen) picks up a pass and produces a ferocious strike towards the right post, but the goalkeeper gets his fingertips to the ball to keep it out.
Karim Abed shows a yellow card to Jonathan Delaplace (Caen) for a tough tackle.
Neymar (Paris SG) fails to convert a close-range free kick as he sends the ball narrowly over the bar.
Karim Abed has ended the first half by blowing the whistle.
The game restarts for the second half.
Lovely run from Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG). He finds himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper, lines up a shot, but the keeper boldly launches himself to intercept the ball.

Frederic Guilbert (Caen) meets a cross inside the penalty area and unloads a good attempt towards the top of the net. Kevin Trapp is prepared, though, and denies him with a fantastic save. The referee blows his whistle, Caen are awarded a corner kick.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) sprints into the box to get on the end of a cross and directs a shot goalwards that flies a whisker wide of the left post. Unlucky!
Goal! Giovani Lo Celso feeds Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG), who taps the ball into an empty net. He makes it 2:0.
Unai Emery has decided to make a change. Stanley Nsoki (Paris SG) replaces Marquinhos.

Neymar (Paris SG) dribbles deep into the box and releases a strike towards the right side of the goal, but Remy Vercoutre makes a sensational reflex save and punches the ball onto the post. Superb goalkeeping!
The referee signals a substitution. Jordan Nkololo (Caen) is brought on as a substitute for Jonathan Delaplace.
Patrice Garande has decided to substitute Stef Peeters and he is replaced by Vincent Bessat (Caen).
Unai Emery has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Julian Draxler (Paris SG) replacing Thiago Motta.
It's 3:0! Neymar feeds Yuri Berchiche (Paris SG) inside the box, who is unmarked and buries the ball in the bottom right corner.
Here is a change. Thomas Meunier is going off and Unai Emery gives the last tactical orders to Christopher Nkunku (Paris SG).
Thiago Silva (Paris SG) handles the ball inside the box. That is a penalty kick for Caen.
Thiago Silva (Paris SG) is rightly booked by the referee because it could not have been anything other than a yellow card.
Goal! Ivan Santini (Caen) runs up to the ball, stops and waits for Kevin Trapp to commit before slotting the penalty into the right of the goal.
The referee blows for the end of today's match.
The first half has started.

Nabil Fekir (Lyon) scores a fabulous 32-metre goal from the free kick. He unleashes a powerful shot which is aimed towards the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper wasn't alert enough. He should have done better.
Adil Rami (Marseille) peeled away from his marker and got on the end of the resulting corner, but he sends his header straight at the goalkeeper.
Today's referee Benoit Bastien rightly decides to book Rolando (Marseille) for his harsh tackle.
What a chance that is! Rolando (Marseille) displays good awareness near the penalty spot to get on the end of a cross, but he sends his header just over the crossbar.

It's unbelievable, Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) blows a huge opportunity! He is totally unmarked and fires a first-time shot towards goal from a few yards out, but Anthony Lopes reacts superbly to keep the ball out.

Florian Thauvin (Marseille) attempted to send a defence-splitting pass into space where Lucas Ocampos was lurking. It could have put him one-on-one with the goalkeeper, but one of the defending players somehow manages to avert the threat. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Marseille.
The referee blows his whistle for half-time, bringing to a close the first 45 minutes of the match.
Everything is set for the start of the second half.
A brilliant cross into the box finds Mariano (Lyon), who steers his low header towards the bottom left corner, but the goalkeeper shows all his agility and makes an astonishing save.
Lyon have a goal ruled out for offside!

Steve Mandanda pulls off a great save to deny Mariano (Lyon) after receiving a precise defence-splitting pass. The effort is headed for the right side of the goal, but the goalkeeper dives superbly to stop it. Definitely the best save of this match so far!
It's a goal! Mariano (Lyon) gets on the end of a pass and it allows him to finish into an empty net with a close-range header. The score has changed to 2:0.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Konstantinos Mitroglou (Marseille) comes onto the pitch for Lucas Ocampos.
Rudi Garcia has decided to make a change. Maxime Lopez (Marseille) replaces Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa.
The foul by Maxime Lopez (Marseille) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Benoit Bastien.
A substitution has been made. Valere Germain goes off and Morgan Sanson (Marseille) comes on.
Morgan Sanson (Marseille) clutches his head. He fired from long range without any hesitation, but the bullet shot crashed against the left post!
Bruno Genesio decides to make a substitution. Mariano will be replaced by Jordan Ferri (Lyon).
The substitution has been made. Memphis Depay (Lyon) has replaced Tanguy Ndombele.

Maxwel Cornet (Lyon) wasted a huge opportunity! The fans already began to celebrate as he unleashed a powerful shot from the edge of the box after a brilliant solo effort. The ball went towards the middle of the goal, but Steve Mandanda made a crucial save!
Memphis Depay (Lyon) takes a rebound on the edge of the box and slams the ball well wide of the left post.
Bruno Genesio prepares a substitution. Nabil Fekir is replaced by Ferland Mendy (Lyon).

What a wonderful moment! Luiz Gustavo (Marseille) receives a perfect pass in the middle of the pitch, lines up the ball and unloads a powerful strike towards the right post. His effort fails to surprise Anthony Lopes, who makes a nice save. Now Marseille have a corner.
Luiz Gustavo (Marseille) rises above the defence and powers a header at the bottom left corner, but the goalkeeper denies him with a superb save.
That's the end of the match.
Today's match has just started, enjoy the game!
Goal! Kylian Mbappe feeds Neymar (Paris SG), who taps the ball into an empty net. He makes it 0:1.
Goal! Neymar passes the ball to the feet of Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG), who has an empty net in front of him and has no problems in tapping the ball in. 0:2.
Neymar (Paris SG) jinks his way past multiple challenges and fires from the edge of the box to the middle of the goal, but Tomas Koubek is equal to it.
Yellow card. Hamari Traore (Rennes) goes into the book for a bad tackle on his opponent.
Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG) doesn't hesitate to shoot inside the box after a neat pass from Dani Alves. It's a good effort but just misses the left post.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) latches on to a pass inside the box and strikes the ball to the middle of the goal, but one of the defending players makes a goal-line clearance.
Presnel Kimpembe (Paris SG) is awarded a yellow card. The referee showed him no mercy.

Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) must feel embarrassed now. He received a killer pass, but his shot from the six-yard box was a disaster. He miskicked and made it very easy for Tomas Koubek to get hold of the ball.

Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) is the first to arrive to a rebound inside the penalty area and unleashes a quick strike towards the bottom right corner that beats the keeper. One of the defenders, however, makes a goal-line clearance.
The referee blows his whistle for half-time, bringing to a close the first 45 minutes of the match.
Referee Antony Gautier blows his whistle to start the second half.
Neymar (Paris SG) had a good opportunity from long range. His shot was directed towards the top right corner, but Tomas Koubek was alert and made a comfortable save.
A cross arrives in the goalmouth from the resulting corner kick. Joris Gnagnon (Rennes) outjumps the defence, but his promising header bounces away off the left post!
Goal 1:2! Firmnin Mubele Ndombe (Rennes) taps home from close range after the rebound fell kindly into his path.
Benjamin Andre (Rennes) picks up a yellow card for an infringement.
We are about to witness a substitution. Wahbi Khazri (Rennes) is replacing Firmnin Mubele Ndombe.
Here is a change. Romain Danze is going off and Sabri Lamouchi gives the last tactical orders to Adrien Hunou (Rennes).
Benjamin Andre (Rennes) must have known he would be sent off for this foul, but he had to stop the opponent at all costs. Antony Gautier shows him a second yellow card and the game has ended for him.
Substitution. Morgan Amalfitano walks off the pitch and Jeremy Gelin (Rennes) comes on as a substitute.
Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG) violates the rules and gets a yellow card.
Julian Draxler comes off the pitch to be replaced by Thiago Motta (Paris SG).
Goal! Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) picks up a pass and gets to the edge of the box before clipping a brilliant lob over the goalkeeper and into the empty net. He makes it 1:3.
Goal! Kylian Mbappe rounded the goalkeeper and sent a sweet pass to Neymar (Paris SG), who had an easy finish to put it into an empty net. 1:4.
The foul by Wahbi Khazri (Rennes) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Antony Gautier.
Here's the change. Giovani Lo Celso leaves the pitch and Javier Pastore (Paris SG) comes on as a substitute.
A great solo run by Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) took him deep inside the box, but his weak effort towards the right side of the goal was easily caught by Tomas Koubek.
Presnel Kimpembe (Paris SG) trips an opposition player and Antony Gautier signals a foul. PENALTY! One of the players from Rennes is about to take a penalty kick. Let's see how this ends.
Presnel Kimpembe (Paris SG) is awarded a yellow card and sent off by Antony Gautier because it's his second one today.
Wahbi Khazri (Rennes) fails to score from the penalty kick. His shot goes just a few inches over the crossbar.
The match has just finished.
Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
Goal! Djibril Sidibe (Monaco) fires the rebound into the top left corner after the ball breaks to him in the box. The score is 0:1.
What a great touch by Falcao (Monaco) as he controls a fine pass into the box and takes a shot to the right side of the goal, but an opposing player makes a clearance. Great defending.
It's a goal! Thomas Lemar (Monaco) scores with a brilliant shot into the bottom right corner after being released inside the box by a superb lofted pass from Balde Keita. The score is now 0:2.
The end of the first half.
The referee blows his whistle to signal the start of the second half.
Goal! Fabinho (Monaco) fires the rebound low into the middle of the goal after the ball breaks to him in the box. The score is 0:3.

Amaury Delerue pulls out a red card and his decision is clear. Stephane Ruffier (St Etienne) is sent off for mouthing off and can take an early bath. The manager looks really angry for his irresponsible behaviour.
The manager has decided to make a tactical substitution following the red card and Vagner walks off the pitch to be replaced by Jessy Moulin (St Etienne).
Balde Keita (Monaco) received a pass and blasted a beautiful rocket of a shot from just outside the penalty area into the bottom left corner. He was given an ovation. Excellent finish.
Jean-Louis Gasset has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Assane Diousse (St Etienne) replacing Hernani.
Substitution. Rachid Ghezzal (Monaco) receives a signal from the referee and is now allowed to enter the pitch as Thomas Lemar walks off.
Vincent Pajot (St Etienne) is lucky to receive a yellow card from the referee because he could easily have been given a red card for his foul.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Guido Carrillo (Monaco) comes onto the pitch for Balde Keita.
Substitution. Adama Diakhaby (Monaco) in, Rony Lopes out.
Jean-Louis Gasset has decided to substitute Remy Cabella and he is replaced by Saidy Janko (St Etienne).
That's the end of the match.
The first half of this match is about to start.
Goal! Kylian Mbappe is the provider and Angel Di Maria (Paris SG) is the executioner, dispatching the cross into the roof of the net from close in with his head. 1:0.
Johan Hamel has ended the first half by blowing the whistle.
Everything is set for the start of the second half.
Half-time substitution. Unai Emery decided to make a change. Adrien Rabiot is replaced by Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG).

Javier Pastore (Paris SG) controls the ball with a great first touch just outside the penalty area after receiving a pass and smashes the ball into the roof of the net to give the goalkeeper no chance!
The referee shows a yellow card to Marco Verratti (Paris SG). No wonder. A clear yellow for bad language.
It's time for a substitution. That's the last involvement from Angel Di Maria as he is replaced by Julian Draxler (Paris SG).
POST! Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) unleashes a thunderous effort from the edge of the box and the ball crashes against the left post. What a strike that was!
The game has come to an end for Thiago Mendes. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of Luiz Araujo (Lille).
Dani Alves (Paris SG) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Johan Hamel had an easy-decision to make.
Here is a change. Nicolas Pepe is going off and Fernando Da Cruz gives the last tactical orders to Anwar El-Ghazi (Lille).
Yassine Benzia (Lille) is shown a yellow card by the referee.
Substitution. Thiago Maia did his best and is replaced by Boubakary Soumare (Lille).
Unai Emery prepares a substitution. Javier Pastore is replaced by Christopher Nkunku (Paris SG).
Goal! Anwar El-Ghazi (Lille) pounced on a loose ball inside the box and beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the bottom left corner. He makes it 2:1.

Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) darts into the penalty area to latch on to a pass, and he unleashes a low shot in the direction of the left post. Mike Maignan is alert and denies him with a nice save. The referee blows his whistle, Paris SG are awarded a corner kick.
GOAL! A terrible mistake leads to a goal. The defender ends up losing possession, allowing Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) to pick up the ball before slotting it into the back of the net to make it 3:1.
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Edgar Ie (Lille) was quite harsh and Johan Hamel didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
That's the end of the match.
The first half has just begun.

It's in the back of the net! Dimitri Lienard flights in the free kick and the ball finds the head of Joia Nuno Da Costa (Strasbourg), whose bullet header from near the penalty spot goes low inside the left post. 1:0.

Alexandre Oukidja pulls off a great save to deny Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) after receiving a precise defence-splitting pass. The effort is headed for the bottom right corner, but the goalkeeper dives superbly to stop it. Definitely the best save of this match so far!
Julian Draxler (Paris SG) misses a sitter from inside the six-yard box after striking the ball towards goal and it goes narrowly wide of the right post.

Goal! Adrien Rabiot plays in Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG), who shows great determination to get to the ball before a couple of defenders and from inside the box he shoots into the left side of the net! Great finish - 1:1.
The referee shows the yellow card to Yuri Berchiche (Paris SG).
What an excellent shot, but not the luckiest one. Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) fires the ball from inside the penalty box but it only hits the left post!
The referee blows his whistle for half-time, bringing to a close the first 45 minutes of the match.
The half-time break is over and the second half is about to start.
Booking. Joia Nuno Da Costa (Strasbourg) receives a caution from the referee.

Joia Nuno Da Costa passes to Stephane Bahoken (Strasbourg), who collects the ball and unleashes a terrific shot from the edge of the box. His effort goes into the top right corner. Fabulous goal! The score is 2:1.
Bingourou Kamara is being substituted because of an injury. Thierry Laurey sends Alexandre Oukidja (Strasbourg) on the pitch.
Substitution. Angel Di Maria will be replaced by Edinson Cavani (Paris SG).
Unai Emery has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Marco Verratti (Paris SG) replacing Julian Draxler.
Substitution. Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG) in, Javier Pastore out.
Here is a change. Stephane Bahoken is going off and Thierry Laurey gives the last tactical orders to Idriss Saadi (Strasbourg).
Here's the change. Joia Nuno Da Costa leaves the pitch and Jeremy Grimm (Strasbourg) comes on as a substitute.
Idriss Saadi (Strasbourg) is booked.
Dimitri Lienard (Strasbourg) is literally asking for a yellow card with his behaviour. The referee agrees and books him.
Ruddy Buquet shows a yellow card to Neymar (Paris SG), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.
Yellow card! It's like Jonas Martin (Strasbourg) was asking for a caution with his behaviour. Ruddy Buquet agrees and books him.
Presnel Kimpembe (Paris SG) is penalised.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) heads the ball towards goal, but his effort is saved by the goalkeeper.
Presnel Kimpembe (Paris SG) receives a fine cross inside the box and attempts to score a goal, but his strike flies just a few inches over the bar.
The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.
Today's match has just started, enjoy the game!
Angel Di Maria (Paris SG) tricks his way to the edge of the box where he shoots at goal. The keeper scrambles to cover the effort, but it goes just wide of the left post.
Thomas Meunier (Paris SG) bends the ball in from the edge of the box which worries the keeper, but it eventually sails just wide of the left post.
Stephane Darbion (Troyes) produced a promising shot towards the middle of the goal after his wonderful solo run, but Kevin Trapp thwarted him with a fabulous save and the score remains the same.
Karim Azamoum (Troyes) is penalised for holding. Jerome Brisard signals a set piece. It's a penalty! Great chance to score for Paris SG!

Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) fails to beat the goalkeeper from the penalty spot with a shot inside the left post. Mamadou Samassa anticipates his intention perfectly, though, and leaps to stop his effort.
The first half of today's match has just finished.
Jerome Brisard blows his whistle and the second half starts.
Adama Niane (Troyes) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Jerome Brisard didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
Substitution. Benjamin Nivet (Troyes) has come on for Saif-Eddine Khaoui.
Jean-Louis Garcia has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Hyun-Jun Suk (Troyes) replacing Adama Niane.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) replaces Angel Di Maria.
Unai Emery decides to make a substitution. Giovani Lo Celso will be replaced by Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG).

Goal! Neymar (Paris SG) picks up the ball from a rebound and from the edge of the box he unleashes a low shot into the bottom right corner. Mamadou Samassa is unable to keep the ball out of the net. It's 1:0.
Jean-Louis Garcia prepares a substitution. Francois Bellugou is replaced by Bryan Pele (Troyes).
Substitution. Javier Pastore makes way for Christopher Nkunku (Paris SG).
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) receives a brilliant pass inside the box from Neymar, and beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the roof of the net. He makes it 2:0.
The referee blows for the end of today's match.
The first half has started.
Goal! Alexandre Mendy (Bordeaux) picks up the ball from a rebound and from the edge of the box he unleashes a shot inside the right post. It's 1:0.

What a beautiful moment! Malcom (Bordeaux) got to the ball and unleashed a strong shot from distance. It turned out to be a good decision as his effort found its way inside the left post. Stephane Ruffier just shakes his head in disbelief. The score changes to 2:0.
Jonathan Cafu (Bordeaux) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Mikael Lesage had an easy-decision to make.
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Vincent Pajot (St Etienne) was quite harsh and Mikael Lesage didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
The end of the first half.
Mikael Lesage blows his whistle and the second half starts.
Problems for Jean-Louis Gasset as Florentin Pogba is not able to play anymore. His injury is too serious and Ronael Pierre-Gabriel (St Etienne) replaces him.
Bryan Dabo goes off the pitch and Alexander Soderlund (St Etienne) comes on.

The ball hits the back of the net! Youssouf Sabaly showcases his brilliant technique and produces a beautiful lofted cross into the box, where Alexandre Mendy (Bordeaux) manages to convert it into a sweet goal. He heads it inside the right post and gets on the scoresheet – 3:0.
Mikael Lesage shows a yellow card to Saidy Janko (St Etienne) for his blatant foul.

A nice cross arrived in the box from the corner kick and found the head of Alexander Soderlund (St Etienne). He steered the ball towards the bottom left corner, but one of the defenders is there to cover the goalkeeper and keep it out.
The manager makes a subsitution with Vagner (St Etienne) coming on for Lois Diony.
A dangerous attempt from Saidy Janko (St Etienne) was aimed towards the roof of the net, but Benoit Costil pulls off a superb save and stops this one.
Here's the change. Valentin Vada leaves the pitch and Jaroslav Plasil (Bordeaux) comes on as a substitute.
Jocelyn Gourvennec prepares a substitution. Jonathan Cafu is replaced by Ervin Taha (Bordeaux).
The manager has decided to make a substitution and Malcom (Bordeaux) walks off the pitch to be replaced by .
The referee blows his whistle for the final time to end this match.
The first half of this match is about to start.
Goal! The free-kick is fired in by Gael Kakuta (Amiens SC) and the ball inadvertently flicks off a defender and spins into the net, leaving Baptiste Reynet stranded. 1:0.

Lacina Traore (Amiens SC) bursts into the box and pulls the trigger, but he can't beat the goalkeeper. He directed his daisy-cutter towards the right post, but one of the defenders reacted brilliantly to block it. Amiens have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.
Frederic Sammaritano feeds the ball through to Chang-Hoon Kwon (Dijon), who picks up the pass inside the box and quickly sends it into the left side of the goal! The goalkeeper was helpless. 1:1!

Cedric Yambere (Dijon) gathers a nice lofted pass deep inside the box and attempts to put the ball inside the right post, but his shot is deflected away by one of the defending players. The referee points to the corner flag and Dijon will take a corner.
The cross fools the defence and leaves Chang-Hoon Kwon (Dijon) with an easy chance inside the box, but he mistimes his shot and sends it just over the bar.

Quentin Cornette (Amiens SC) receives a low pass just outside the box and unleashes a fine strike towards the roof of the net. Baptiste Reynet pulls off a reflexive save to block his effort. Nice goalkeeping skill, indeed. Corner kick. Amiens will have an opportunity.
Gael Kakuta (Amiens SC) expertly controls a neat clever pass on the edge of the penalty area, but his effort smashes against the right post! What a shot that was!
The referee blows his whistle to end the first half and the players are now heading to their respective dressing rooms.
The second half has just started.

Quentin Cornette (Amiens SC) latches on to a precise lofted cross inside the box, controls the ball and unleashes a fine strike towards the middle of the goal. His dangerous effort is blocked by Baptiste Reynet, who makes a glorious save!
Goal! Quentin Cornette (Amiens SC) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball low into the middle of the net. It's 2:1.
Here comes a substitution. Wesley Said (Dijon) is brought on as a substitute for Florent Balmont.
Wesley Said (Dijon) has a goal ruled out for offside!
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Harisson Manzala (Amiens SC) replaces Quentin Cornette.
Wesley Said (Dijon) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a promising strike towards the left post. Regis Gurtner guesses his intentions and denies him with a fine save.
The manager has decided to make a substitution and Thomas Monconduit walks off the pitch to be replaced by Julien Ielsch (Amiens SC).
Julio Tavares (Dijon) goes for goal but he directs his effort just wide of the left post.
Mehdi Abeid (Dijon) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Karim Abed had an easy-decision to make.
Here is a change. Mehdi Abeid is going off and Olivier Dall'Oglio gives the last tactical orders to Romain Amalfitano (Dijon).
Julio Tavares (Dijon) plants a goal-bound header towards the middle of the target after a nice cross inside the box, but one of the defenders manages to deflect it away.
Substitution. Frederic Sammaritano leaves the pitch and is replaced by Benjamin Jeannot (Dijon).
Wesley Said (Dijon) does well to control a poor pass on the edge of the box then shoots low towards the middle of the goal. Regis Gurtner is out of position but leaps to make a brilliant save.
Substitution. Lacina Traore will be replaced by Khaled Adenon (Amiens SC).
Karim Abed shows a yellow card to Oussama Haddadi (Dijon) for his blatant foul.
Karim Abed is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.
Frederic Sammaritano (Dijon) goes into the referee's book for dissent.
The match has just started.

Martin Terrier (Strasbourg) goes on a mazy run, skips past two defenders and pulls the trigger in front of the keeper. Remy Vercoutre makes a decent save to deny his effort directed to the right side of the target.

Ronny Rodelin (Caen) had a good opportunity when he latched on to a cross from the wing, but his strike from near the penalty spot wasn't accurate at all and the ball went way wide of the right post. What a miss that is!
Ivan Santini (Caen) receives a lofted pass from the side and shoots from around the penalty spot, but the ball flies onto the left post!
Stephane Jochem shows a yellow card to Aleksander Djiku (Caen) for his blatant foul.
A precise first-time shot by Jordan Nkololo (Caen) inside the box is unwittingly blocked by a defender.
The first half of today's match has just finished.
The second half has just started.
Romain Genevois (Caen) commits a foul and is shown a yellow card without any hesitation from the referee.
Ronny Rodelin (Caen) makes a yard for himself inside the box after an accurate pass and takes a shot that goes just wide of the left post.
Here comes a substitution. Julien Feret is given a rest as he is replaced by Youssef Ait Bennasser (Caen).
Thierry Laurey decides to make a substitution. Anthony Goncalves will be replaced by Jeremy Blayac (Strasbourg).
Patrice Garande prepares a substitution. Bel Durel Avounou is replaced by Yoel Armougom (Caen).

Jean-Eudes Aholou (Strasbourg) does well to control a poor pass on the edge of the box then shoots towards the bottom left corner. Remy Vercoutre is out of position but leaps to make a brilliant save.
Substitution. Joia Nuno Da Costa will be replaced by Ihsan Sacko (Strasbourg).
Bakary Kone (Strasbourg) has tested the patience of referee Stephane Jochem and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
Jordan Nkololo (Caen) latches onto a pass inside the box, steps inside his marker and smacks a shot against the crossbar.
Substitution. Jonas Martin is replaced by Idriss Saadi (Strasbourg).
The referee blows for the end of today's match.
The first half has started.
Neymar rounds off a good move with a layoff to Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) inside the box, he has a clear sight of goal but sends the ball just wide of the left post.
Julian Draxler (Paris SG) receives a brilliant pass and wastes a big opportunity as his shot from inside the penalty area flies narrowly wide of the left post.
Today's referee Francois Letexier rightly decides to book Jorge (Monaco) for his harsh tackle.
Goal! Julian Draxler tees up Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) inside the box, and he keeps his cool to find the roof of the net. 0:1.
Francois Letexier shows a yellow card to Layvin Kurzawa (Paris SG) for a tough tackle.
A yellow card for a tackle by Jemerson (Monaco). Francois Letexier doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.

Julian Draxler (Paris SG) collects a great pass inside the box and misses a golden opportunity. His low drive is headed for the bottom right corner, but the goalkeeper pulls off a marvellous diving save and denies him. The referee blows his whistle, Paris SG are awarded a corner kick.
The foul by Neymar (Paris SG) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Francois Letexier.
The end of the first half.
The half-time break is over and the second half is about to start.

OFF THE POST! Neymar (Paris SG) drifts into the box to give his teammate support. He receives a fantastic pass and shoots from close range, but it crashes against the right post! It could have been a brilliant goal, unlucky.

He should have scored! Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) latches onto a pull back in the box right in front of goal, but his shot towards the middle of the goal is pretty weak and Danijel Subasic makes an easy save. Good work from Paris SG as they win a corner.
Almamy Toure (Monaco) is penalised for holding. Francois Letexier signals a set piece. Paris SG have been awarded a penalty kick!
Almamy Toure (Monaco) gets booked for the first time in this match.
Goal! Neymar (Paris SG) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past Danijel Subasic into the bottom left corner.
Leonardo Jardim has decided to make a change. Rony Lopes (Monaco) replaces Andrea Raggi.
The manager makes a subsitution with Rachid Ghezzal (Monaco) coming on for Youri Tielemans.
Unai Emery has decided to substitute Layvin Kurzawa and he is replaced by Yuri Berchiche (Paris SG).
Close! Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) picks up the ball in space and from inside the penalty area sends a shot narrowly over the bar.
Golden chance! Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) meets a cross in the box and finds some space for a shot. He produces an inaccurate effort that goes wide of the left post.
The referee signals a substitution. Djibril Sidibe (Monaco) is brought on as a substitute for Balde Keita.
Goal! Joao Moutinho (Monaco) takes the resulting free-kick from the edge of the box, but the ball takes a deflection off a defender and goes past the helpless Alphonse Areola and into the net. 1:2.

Here is a change. Julian Draxler is going off and Unai Emery gives the last tactical orders to Javier Pastore (Paris SG).

Konstantinos Mitroglou (Marseille) latches on to a precise lofted cross inside the box, controls the ball and unleashes a fine strike towards the middle of the goal. His dangerous effort is blocked by Karl-Johan Johnsson, who makes a glorious save!
Dimitri Payet (Marseille) runs onto the ball and hits a thunderbolt of a shot at goal from the edge of the box, but sends it narrowly wide of the right post.

Konstantinos Mitroglou (Marseille) attempts to convert a lofted cross as he jumps high and heads the ball to the middle of the goal. Karl-Johan Johnsson shows his brilliant reflexes and pulls off a glorious save to stop the ball from hitting the net.

Florian Thauvin (Marseille) is put clean through inside the box by Luiz Gustavo, but he gets right under the ball and sends it just over the bar. Should have been a goal!

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Felix Eboa Eboa (Guingamp) was quite harsh and Amaury Delerue didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

Substitution. Hiroki Sakai (Marseille) in, Florian Thauvin out.
That's all for today as the game is over.

Memphis Depay (Lyon) latches on to a precise pass inside the box and sends in a superb strike that finds its way inside the left post and hits the net.
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Marlon (Nice) was quite harsh and Frank Schneider didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

Memphis Depay (Lyon) picks up a cross inside the box and unleashes a quick shot towards the right side of the goal. His promising effort is kept out by Walter Benitez, who pulls off a stunning save! Mariano (Lyon) misses a rebound from close range. His effort floats narrowly over the crossbar!
An amazing individual effort from Maxwel Cornet (Lyon) ends with a strike from inside the penalty area. He sends the ball into the left side of the goal and makes it 0:2. Walter Benitez was helpless.
Jean Michael Seri (Nice) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Frank Schneider had an easy-decision to make.
Maxwel Cornet (Lyon) was probably a bit loose with his words to Frank Schneider, who decides to show him a yellow.
Goal - 0:3! Houssem Aouar laid the ball off to Mariano (Lyon), who shot from close range into the bottom left corner, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.
Marcelo (Lyon) commits a foul and is shown a yellow card without any hesitation from the referee.

Half-time substitution. Jean Michael Seri will not participate anymore and Arnaud Lusamba (Nice) is coming on.
The teams are back out for the second half and here is a change on the pitch. Lucien Favre gives a chance to Pierre Lees Melou (Nice) and Arnaud Souquet is off.
Mario Balotelli (Nice) takes the resulting free kick from 23 metres out. He attempts to send his effort into the middle of the goal, but Anthony Lopes is alert and keeps the ball out.
Dante (Nice) has tested the patience of referee Frank Schneider and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
The referee allows time for a substitution. Mario Balotelli will be replaced by Bassem Srarfi (Nice).
Here is a change. Lucas Tousart is going off and Bruno Genesio gives the last tactical orders to Jordan Ferri (Lyon).
RED CARD! Marlon (Nice) makes a bad challenge and receives a second yellow card from Frank Schneider. He can have an early bath.
Yellow card. Nampalys Mendy (Nice) goes into the referee's book after a bad challenge.
It will be a substitution. Myziane Maolida (Lyon) is ready to enter the pitch as Mariano walks off.
The substitution is prepared. Amine Gouiri (Lyon) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Memphis Depay.
Myziane Maolida (Lyon) receives a killer pass, finds himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper and scores with aplomb inside the right post. What a beautiful finish that is!
Jordan Ferri (Lyon) takes his opponent down and receives a yellow card from the referee.
The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.
The first half has just begun.
Nicolas De Preville (Bordeaux) makes himself some space on the edge of the penalty area and pulls the trigger. His accurate effort goes in off the post and the score changes to 1:0.
Francois Kamano links up with Younousse Sankhare (Bordeaux), who fires just over the bar from the edge of the box.
Today's referee Benoit Millot rightly decides to book Nicolas De Preville (Bordeaux) for his harsh tackle.
Florian Thauvin (Marseille) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Benoit Millot ignores the protests.
That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.
The whistle blows and Benoit Millot starts the second half.
Rudi Garcia makes a switch. Maxime Lopez (Marseille) is coming on in place of Dimitri Payet at the start of the second period.

Florian Thauvin (Marseille) had a good opportunity when he latched on to a cross from the wing, but his strike from the six-yard box wasn't accurate enough and the ball went a few inches wide of the right post.
Maxime Lopez (Marseille) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Benoit Millot didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
Benoit Millot shows a yellow card to Igor Lewczuk (Bordeaux), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.
Francois Kamano (Bordeaux) fouls his opponent and receives a yellow card from the referee, but he is clearly not happy with the decision.
A yellow card for a tackle by Lukas Lerager (Bordeaux). Benoit Millot doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
Substitution. Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa makes his way off the pitch and Valere Germain (Marseille) comes on as his replacement.
Jocelyn Gourvennec has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Alexandre Mendy (Bordeaux) replacing Nicolas De Preville.
Igor Lewczuk will be replaced by Olivier Verdon (Bordeaux).
Rudi Garcia has decided to make a change. Bouna Sarr (Marseille) replaces Hiroki Sakai.
Younousse Sankhare (Bordeaux) took a first-time shot from mid-range after he was put in the clear by a great pass, but the effort lacked a little accuracy and went just wide of the left post.
The referee allows time for a substitution. Francois Kamano will be replaced by Jonathan Cafu (Bordeaux).
Konstantinos Mitroglou (Marseille) receives a lofted pass from the flank and shoots from close range, but the ball flies just over the crossbar, almost brushing it.
Morgan Sanson (Marseille) receives a great chance inside the box and finds the back of the net with a low drive that goes into the middle of the net.
Benoit Millot is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.
The first half has just begun.
Gonzalez Piriz (Montpellier) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Karim Abed didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
Houssem Aouar (Lyon) misses a sitter from inside the six-yard box after striking the ball towards goal and it goes narrowly wide of the right post.
Paul Lasne (Montpellier) hammers the ball from far out, but it goes narrowly over the bar.
A yellow card for a tackle by Kenny Tete (Lyon). Karim Abed doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.

Maxwel Cornet (Lyon) runs onto a loose pass inside the box and releases a tremendous shot low towards the middle of the goal. However, Benjamin Lecomte anticipates the shot and makes an easy save. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Lyon.
That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.
The second half has just started.

Bertrand Traore (Lyon) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Karim Abed ignores the protests.
