Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) strikes from the edge of the box, but hits it really poorly and sends the ball way wide of the right post.
A lofted pass into the box is met by Lima (Nantes), who rifles a shot just over the bar.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) receives a delightful pass inside the box and smashes a low shot into the bottom left corner. What a clinical finish!

Angel Di Maria (Paris SG) runs with the ball towards the keeper and pulls the trigger from close range, but Ciprian Tatarusanu anticipates his intention and makes an amazing save to stop the shot going into the right side of the target. The linesman makes the right call and Paris SG will have a corner.

What a beautiful moment! Angel Di Maria (Paris SG) got to the ball and unleashed a strong shot from distance. It turned out to be a good decision as his effort found its way inside the left post. Ciprian Tatarusanu just shakes his head in disbelief. The score changes to 2:0.
The match has reached half-time.
The referee blows his whistle to signal the start of the second half.
Lima comes off the pitch to be replaced by Jules Iloki (Nantes).
Yuri Berchiche (Paris SG) sees a yellow card. He should be more careful because one more challenge like that could result in a red card.
The whistle blows and Nicolas Pallois (Nantes) is booked for an infringement.
Here is a change. Andrei Girotto is going off and Claudio Ranieri gives the last tactical orders to Prejuce Nakoulma (Nantes).
Prejuce Nakoulma (Nantes) received a delightful pass inside the box before slotting the ball past the goalkeeper. What a brilliant finish!
Chidozie Awaziem (Nantes) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Nicolas Rainville ignores the protests.
The referee has issued a yellow card to Koffi Djidji (Nantes).
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) receives a sweet pass into the box that puts him in a one-on-one against the goalkeeper. He accepts this chance and rips a shot into the top left corner. Brilliant finish!
We are about to witness a subsitution. Adrien Thomasson (Nantes) for Koffi Djidji.
Marco Verratti (Paris SG) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Nicolas Rainville didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) had time and space inside the box after picking up a neat pass, but his shot low towards the middle of the goal was comfortably saved by Ciprian Tatarusanu.
Goal! Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball into the middle of the net. It's 4:1.

The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Adrien Rabiot trots off the pitch and is replaced by Christopher Nkunku (Paris SG).
That's all for today as the game is over.

Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) meets a perfect cross from Dani Alves deep inside the box and controls it with a nice first touch. He produces an accurate strike into the bottom left corner via the post. It's 0:1.
Vincent Manceau (Angers) latches onto a loose ball inside the box but slams it high over the bar.
Goal! Dani Alves gets to the ball, slips Julian Draxler (Paris SG) into the area and he scores with a delightful chipped finish to make it 0:2.
It's 0:3! Kylian Mbappe feeds Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) inside the box, who is unmarked and buries the ball in the bottom right corner.
Ismael Traore (Angers) watches the corner all the way, but places his header just over the bar from close range.
A yellow-coloured card is received by Gilles Sunu (Angers).
There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Benoit Bastien has ended it.
The game restarts for the second half.
Stephane Moulin decides to make a substitution. Mateo Pavlovic will be replaced by Angelo Fulgini (Angers).
That's the end of the game for Gilles Sunu, who is replaced by Enzo Crivelli (Angers).
Angelo Fulgini (Angers) places a shot at goal from the edge of the box that bends just wide of the right post.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) latches on to a killer pass deep inside the box and coolly puts the ball inside the right post!
Today's match ends for Dani Alves who will be replaced by Thomas Meunier (Paris SG).
Unai Emery has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG) replacing Julian Draxler.
Substitution. Edinson Cavani leaves the pitch and is replaced by Lucas (Paris SG).
Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) is literally asking for a yellow card with his behaviour. The referee agrees and books him.

A yellow card for a tackle by Presnel Kimpembe (Paris SG). Benoit Bastien doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
The referee blows his whistle for the final time to end this match.

Florian Thauvin sends a cross in from the free kick. Morgan Sanson (Marseille) wins the ball and smashes it into the bottom left corner, increasing the score to 0:1.
It must be a yellow card. It is. Patrice Evra (Marseille) receives the caution after an awful tackle.

Anwar El-Ghazi (Lille) latches on to a precise pass and finds himself one-on-one with the keeper. He fires a low shot towards the left side of the net, but Steve Mandanda leaps like a salmon to deny him. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Lille.
The free kick into the box finds Ibrahim Amadou (Lille), who heads the ball towards the right post, but the keeper pulls off a fantastic reflex save. Great goalkeeping skills.
Luiz Gustavo (Marseille) has tested the patience of referee Francois Letexier and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

Marcelo Bielsa prepares a substitution. Luiz Araujo is replaced by Fares Bahlouli (Lille).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Edgar Ie (Lille) was quite harsh and Francois Letexier didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

Thiago Mendes (Lille) goes into the book for a horrible tackle. A yellow card is necessary in this case.

Ezequiel Ponce (Lille) goes for goal and shoots towards the left side of the goal, but his effort is well blocked. The ball is out of play. A goal-scoring opportunity from a corner for Lille.

One of the defenders is in the right place at the right time and makes a vital stop to deny a close-range header from Thiago Maia (Lille). The linesman makes the right call and Lille will have a corner.
The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.
The first half has started.

Wonderful movement! Fernando Marcal is in a good position inside the box but decides to pass the ball to Nabil Fekir (Lyon), who keeps his cool and blasts the ball inside the left post. What a finish that is – 1:0.
Goal! Kenny Tete plays a simple square pass into the feet of Nabil Fekir (Lyon) in the box, who composes himself and lashes the ball low into the middle of the goal. 2:0.
Carlos Miguel Cafu (Metz) receives a yellow card from the referee for a foul that he committed a little earlier.

Memphis Depay (Lyon) bursts into the box and pulls the trigger, but he can't beat the goalkeeper. He directed his shot towards the middle of the goal, but one of the defenders reacted brilliantly to block it.
Benoit Millot has ended the first half by blowing the whistle.
The second half has just started.
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Chris Philipps (Metz) was quite harsh and Benoit Millot didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
Mariano (Lyon) gathers a cross inside the box and strikes the ball. He wastes a great scoring opportunity as his shot only hits the right-hand post.
Benoit Millot shows a yellow card to Jonathan Rivierez (Metz) for his blatant foul.
It is time for a substitution. Brian Fernandez (Metz) is on for Nolan Roux.
Jose Pinot prepares a substitution. Carlos Miguel Cafu is replaced by Vincent Thill (Metz).
Mathieu Dossevi (Metz) meets a cross inside the penalty area and unloads a good attempt towards the bottom right corner. Anthony Lopes is prepared, though, and denies him with a fantastic save.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Maxwel Cornet (Lyon) replaces Memphis Depay.
The referee signals a substitution. Tanguy Ndombele (Lyon) is brought on as a substitute for Bertrand Traore.
Maxwel Cornet (Lyon) shoots at goal from the free kick from some 26 metres out. His attempt was quite precise and another few inches and it would have ended up inside the right post.
Bruno Genesio decides to make a substitution. Houssem Aouar will be replaced by Myziane Maolida (Lyon).
It will be a substitution. Opa Nguette (Metz) is ready to enter the pitch as Jonathan Rivierez walks off.

A defence-splitting pass is taken in his stride by Maxwel Cornet (Lyon) in the box. Without even looking up he drills a shot towards the right side of the goal, but Eiji Kawashima pulls off a brilliant save. The ball is out of play and Lyon manage to earn a corner.
Nothing more will happen in this game as the referee blows for full time.
Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
GOAL! Angel Di Maria curls the free kick into the box. Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) peels off his marker and arrows a brilliant header past Walter Benitez and into the left side of the net. 1:0.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) had time and space inside the box after picking up a neat pass, but his shot low towards the middle of the goal was comfortably saved by Walter Benitez.

Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) weaves his way past several defenders and finds himself in a one-on-one with the keeper. His dummy throws the keeper off balance and he simply puts the ball into the back of net.
Angel Di Maria (Paris SG) darts into the penalty area to latch on to a pass, and he unleashes a shot towards the middle of the net, but Walter Benitez is alert and denies him.
There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Tony Chapron has ended it.
The second half has just started.
Dante (Nice) has scored an own goal! No one would like to be in his shoes right now.
Close! Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) picks up the ball in space and from inside the penalty area sends a shot inches wide of the left post.
Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) shows his willingness to get forward and blasts a shot towards goal. Unfortunately for him, the shot isn't precise enough and hits the right post!
Lucien Favre has decided to substitute Nampalys Mendy and he is replaced by Adrien Tameze (Nice).
The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG) will replace Adrien Rabiot.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Mario Balotelli departs the field of play to be replaced by Alassane Plea (Nice).
Lucien Favre decides to make a substitution. Pierre Lees Melou will be replaced by Allan Saint-Maximin (Nice).
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Kylian Mbappe leaves the pitch and Javier Pastore (Paris SG) comes on.
The substitution is prepared. Lucas (Paris SG) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Edinson Cavani.

Lucas (Paris SG) takes a wonderful touch after collecting a pass inside the box. He steers his shot goalwards, but the keeper produces a decent save! Paris SG will have a chance to score from a corner kick.
The match has just finished.
The first half of this match is about to start.
The rebound finds Layvin Kurzawa (Paris SG) in space inside the box, but his shot flies high over the bar. That was a promising chance!
Luiz Gustavo (Marseille) collected a pass and decided to shoot from about 25 metres out. He hit it perfectly! The ball zoomed around the goalkeeper and ended up in the bottom left corner.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) finds space inside the box to shoot after collecting a short pass, but it's a wasted effort as it flies high over the bar.
Neymar (Paris SG) drills a sweet first-time effort into the bottom right corner, deflecting in off the post.
Ruddy Buquet shows the yellow card to Konstantinos Mitroglou (Marseille) for a heavy challenge.
The match has reached half-time.
The second half has just started.
The foul by Hiroki Sakai (Marseille) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Ruddy Buquet.
Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) uses the wrong choice of words while trying to explain something to the referee and receives a yellow card for dissent.
It is time for a substitution. Clinton N'Jie (Marseille) is on for Konstantinos Mitroglou.
Unai Emery has decided to substitute Thiago Motta and he is replaced by Julian Draxler (Paris SG).
Substitution. Morgan Sanson (Marseille) on for Dimitri Payet.
Florian Thauvin (Marseille) receives a killer pass, finds himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper and scores with aplomb inside the right post. What a beautiful finish that is!
We are about to witness a subsitution. Angel Di Maria (Paris SG) for Kylian Mbappe.
Rudi Garcia decides to make a substitution. Florian Thauvin will be replaced by Bouna Sarr (Marseille).
Neymar (Paris SG) attempts to discuss the decision with Ruddy Buquet, but he soon realises that it's not the right thing to do as he sees the yellow.
A yellow card for a tackle by Lucas Ocampos (Marseille). Ruddy Buquet doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
Neymar (Paris SG) sees a yellow card in the hand of Ruddy Buquet. And as it's a second one this game, a red follows and Neymar (Paris SG) is sent from the pitch.

Bouna Sarr (Marseille) goes on a mazy run, skips past two defenders and pulls the trigger in front of the keeper. Alphonse Areola makes a decent save to deny his effort directed low to the middle of the target.
Morgan Sanson (Marseille) sees a yellow card from Ruddy Buquet after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) scores a stunning goal from the free kick! He curls his shot in off the crossbar. What a hit!
The referee blows his whistle for the final time to end this match.
The match has just started.
Neymar (Paris SG) has tested the patience of referee Jerome Miguelgorry and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
Naim Sliti (Dijon) commits a foul and is shown a yellow card without any hesitation from the referee.
Dani Alves (Paris SG) takes the resulting free kick from the edge of the box. His rocket of a shot crashes against the crossbar! What a shot.
There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Jerome Miguelgorry has ended it.
The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Presnel Kimpembe (Paris SG) was quite harsh and Jerome Miguelgorry didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
Yellow card. Valentin Rosier (Dijon) goes into the book for a bad tackle on his opponent.
Jerome Miguelgorry shows a yellow card to Dani Alves (Paris SG) for his blatant foul.

The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Dijon. Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) comes close to scoring. He peels away from his marker and gets on the end of a cross from Angel Di Maria, but he hits a shot just over the crossbar.
Marquinhos (Paris SG) latches on to a superb cross inside the box but only hits the crossbar with a fine header. What a chance! The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Dijon.

Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) darts into the penalty area to latch on to a pass, and he unleashes a shot in the direction of the left post. Baptiste Reynet is alert and denies him with a nice save. The referee points to the corner flag and Paris SG will take a corner.

Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) picks up a lofted cross inside the box and releases a quick shot to the bottom left corner. His promising effort is kept out by Baptiste Reynet, who pulls off a stunning save!
Goal! Thomas Meunier (Paris SG) fires the rebound into the bottom right corner after the ball breaks to him in the box. The score is 0:1.
Olivier Dall'Oglio prepares a substitution. Naim Sliti is replaced by Wesley Said (Dijon).
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Julian Draxler trots off the pitch and is replaced by Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG).
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Frederic Sammaritano (Dijon) comes onto the pitch for Chang-Hoon Kwon.
Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) picks up a yellow card.
Jordan Marie (Dijon) is yellow-carded.
Unai Emery has decided to substitute Angel Di Maria and he is replaced by Lucas (Paris SG).
Olivier Dall'Oglio decides to make a substitution. Jordan Marie will be replaced by Florent Balmont (Dijon).
Benjamin Jeannot (Dijon) fires a stunning volley towards goal from long-range and the ball goes into the roof of the net after flying past the goalkeeper!
Benjamin Jeannot (Dijon) goes into the book and receives a yellow card.
Goal! Kylian Mbappe plays it to Thomas Meunier (Paris SG), whose deflected shot from inside the box goes past the helpless Baptiste Reynet. 1:2.
That's it for today, Jerome Miguelgorry has blown his whistle and the game is over.
Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
Goal! A great through ball by Nabil Fekir sets up Mariano (Lyon) inside the box, and he makes no mistake and bangs the ball into the right side of the goal. 1:0.
Goal - 1:1! Balde Keita tees up Rony Lopes (Monaco) inside the box and he curls the ball into the left side of the net and past Anthony Lopes.

That didn't go as planned! Tanguy Ndombele (Lyon) tried his luck from the edge of the box, but his effort towards the right side of the goal was too weak to get past Danijel Subasic, who easily kept it out.
Goal! Nabil Fekir (Lyon) beautifully controls a strongly hit pass from Ferland Mendy inside the box. He cuts inside his marker and rifles the ball into the left side of the goal. 2:1.
Kenny Tete (Lyon) shoots from the edge of the penalty area. The ball travels towards the right side of the target, but Danijel Subasic easily deals with the threat.
Adama Traore (Monaco) smashes the ball into the top right corner of the goal to give the goalkeeper absolutely no chance of making a save!
The referee can't ignore those comments and Nabil Fekir (Lyon) sees a yellow card for bad language.
The match has reached half-time.
The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.
Mapou Yanga-Mbiwa (Lyon) has to be very careful for the rest of the match after receiving a yellow card from the referee for a bad tackle on an opponent.
Anthony Lopes (Lyon) fails to control his temper and is booked by the referee for dissent.
Adama Traore (Monaco) is shown a yellow card by the referee for making a challenge on his opponent, but he looks angry with the decision.
Substitution. Bertrand Traore will be replaced by Memphis Depay (Lyon).
Adama Traore (Monaco) creates a yard of space for himself and tries an effort from the edge of the box, but it goes just wide of the left post.
Mariano (Lyon) shakes off the attention of a defender and from mid-range lets fly towards the middle of the goal, but Danijel Subasic is well positioned to make a comfortable save.
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Mouctar Diakhaby (Lyon) was quite harsh and Benoit Bastien didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
OFF THE POST! Mariano (Lyon) decides to direct the free kick at goal from about 30 out. His effort was almost perfect, but to his disappointment only rattled the right post.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Youri Tielemans (Monaco) comes onto the pitch for Adama Traore.
Bruno Genesio has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Myziane Maolida (Lyon) replacing Tanguy Ndombele.
Substitution. Ferland Mendy makes way for Fernando Marcal (Lyon).
The substitution has been made. Gabriel Boschilia (Monaco) has replaced Thomas Lemar.
Youri Tielemans (Monaco) has a great chance inside the six-yard box, shoots to the left side of the goal, but Anthony Lopes pulls off an exquisite save to deny him. Monaco will take a corner kick.
The assistant referee raises his flag and the referee blows his whistle. Nabil Fekir (Lyon) puts the ball into the net, but he is flagged for offside.
Here is a change. Balde Keita is going off and Leonardo Jardim gives the last tactical orders to Guido Carrillo (Monaco).
Nabil Fekir (Lyon) takes the free kick and beats the goalkeeper with a shot which goes inside the left post. Simply stunning!
That's all for today as the game is over.
Here we go, today's match is starting right now.

Mario Balotelli (Nice) connects with the ball from the resulting corner and places a powerful header past the stranded goalkeeper and into the roof of the net. The opposing players are staring at each other, unable to understand what happened. Who will take the blame for that one? Mario Balotelli (Nice) has a reason to celebrate!

Steve Mandanda hears the fans clapping his superb goalkeeping. Jean Michael Seri (Nice) shoots from the edge of the box towards the top right corner, but the goalkeeper makes a magnificent save. Nice will take a corner kick.

Jean Michael Seri (Nice) quickly gets to a rebound. He is not worried how far out he is and slams the ball towards the goal. To the amazement of all, it goes all the way into the bottom left corner. He makes it 2:0 with this magnificent strike.
Goal! Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) pounced on a loose ball inside the box and beats the goalkeeper with a shot inside the left post. He makes it 2:1.
Pierre Lees Melou (Nice) kept talking out of turn to the referee until Benoit Bastien lost patience and pulled out a yellow card.
Dimitri Payet (Marseille) sees a yellow card from Benoit Bastien after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.
An unfortunate own goal is conceded by Pierre Lees Melou (Nice), who attempted to block the ball after a cross, but instead he sends it into the top left corner of his own goal.
Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) gets to a rebound inside the six-yard box and produces a header. He manages to put the ball into the roof of the net, and thus alter the score to 2:3.
The referee blows his whistle to end the first half and the players are now heading to their respective dressing rooms.
The referee blows his whistle to signal the start of the second half.

What a beautiful moment! Luiz Gustavo (Marseille) got to the ball and unleashed a strong shot from distance. It turned out to be a good decision as his effort found its way into the bottom left corner. Yoan Cardinale just shakes his head in disbelief. The score changes to 2:4.
The referee gives a yellow card to Alassane Plea (Nice).
Benoit Bastien shows a yellow card to Jordan Amavi (Marseille) for a tough tackle.
Luiz Gustavo (Marseille) clatters into his opponent and is shown a red card by the referee! Despite protesting, he knows the match has ended for him.
It is time for a substitution. Gregory Sertic (Marseille) is on for Florian Thauvin.
Lucien Favre has decided to substitute Malang Sarr and he is replaced by Marlon (Nice).
Substitution. Igniatius Ganago (Nice) in, Pierre Lees Melou out.
Rudi Garcia decides to make a substitution. Clinton N'Jie will be replaced by Valere Germain (Marseille).
Benoit Bastien blows his whistle after Gregory Sertic (Marseille) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle. The referee points to the penalty spot. PENALTY to Nice!

Alassane Plea (Nice) blows a huge chance to score! He sends the penalty low to the middle of the goal, but it's not enough to beat Steve Mandanda who easily stops the effort. The ball is out of play. A goal-scoring opportunity from a corner for Nice.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Dimitri Payet leaves the pitch and Bouna Sarr (Marseille) comes on.
Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Benoit Bastien didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
That's the end of the game for Nampalys Mendy, who is replaced by Vincent Koziello (Nice).
That's the end of the match.
The first half of this match is about to start.

Neymar (Paris SG) unleashes a beautiful rocket of a shot from a long-range free kick. The ball goes into the top left corner and leaves the goalkeeper beaten. This takes hours and hours on the training ground. The score is 1:0.
Goal - 2:0! Neymar laid the ball off to Edinson Cavani (Paris SG), who shot from close range into the bottom right corner, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.
Thomas Meunier (Paris SG) scores! He latches on to a pass and produces a perfect strike from the edge of the box that goes into the roof of the net and past the goalkeeper.
Goal! Younousse Sankhare (Bordeaux) finds himself some space inside the box to get on the end of a pass from Nicolas De Preville, then sends the ball low into the middle of the net. 3:1.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Igor Lewczuk (Bordeaux) replaces Youssouf Sabaly.
Francois Kamano (Bordeaux) jumps for a cross in the goal area and produces a fine header which goes narrowly wide of the left post! What a huge opportunity!
Otavio (Bordeaux) handles the ball inside the box. It's a penalty! Great chance to score for Paris SG!
The referee can't ignore those comments and Vukasin Jovanovic (Bordeaux) sees a yellow card for bad language.
Goal! Neymar (Paris SG) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past Benoit Costil into the bottom left corner.
What a hit! Julian Draxler (Paris SG) shows good composure inside the box to fire a first-time shot into the top of the net. 5:1.
Thomas Meunier (Paris SG) takes his opponent down and receives a yellow card from the referee.
The match has reached half-time.
The half-time break is over and the second half is about to start.
Jocelyn Gourvennec decides to make a substitution. Nicolas De Preville will be replaced by Alexandre Mendy (Bordeaux).

Julian Draxler is in a good shooting position, but he sees his teammate and passes the ball to him. Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) takes it nicely and beats the goalkeeper with a precise shot into the bottom left corner to make the score 6:1.
The referee signals a substitution. Angel Di Maria (Paris SG) is brought on as a substitute for Edinson Cavani.
Younousse Sankhare (Bordeaux) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Francois Letexier had an easy-decision to make.

OFF THE POST! Alexandre Mendy (Bordeaux) drifts into the box to give his teammate support. He receives a fantastic pass and shoots from close range, but it crashes against the right post! It could have been a brilliant goal, unlucky.
That's the end of the game for Adrien Rabiot, who is replaced by Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG).
Substitution. Francois Kamano will be replaced by Jonathan Cafu (Bordeaux).
Neymar (Paris SG) missed a big chance! He produces a stunning volley from inside the box, but his effort goes not far wide of the right post.
Unai Emery has decided to make a change. Christopher Nkunku (Paris SG) replaces Marco Verratti.
Close effort! Malcom (Bordeaux) takes the resulting free kick from a promising distance, but he sends it narrowly wide of the right post.
An opponent rises to his feet after being downed by Thomas Meunier (Paris SG). Francois Letexier saw the sliding tackle and blows for a foul. It's a penalty for Bordeaux!
Goal! Malcom (Bordeaux) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past Alphonse Areola into right side of the goal.
Francois Letexier is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.
The first half has started.
Isaac Mbenza (Montpellier) produces a shot from a direct free kick on the edge of the box. His effort sails narrowly over the crossbar. The goalkeeper was lucky there.
Isaac Mbenza (Montpellier) is afforded space inside the box after collecting a pass, but the chance is wasted as his shot goes harmlessly over the crossbar.
Ellyes Skhiri (Montpellier) is shown a yellow card by the referee for a bad sliding tackle on an opponent.

Pedro Mendes (Montpellier) latches on to a precise lofted cross inside the box, controls the ball and drills a fine strike towards the middle of the goal. His dangerous effort is blocked by Danijel Subasic, who makes a glorious save!
Fabinho (Monaco) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Tony Chapron had an easy-decision to make. A free kick has been awarded to Montpellier.
Goal! Falcao (Monaco) takes a short pass from Rony Lopes in his stride in the box, jinks inside his man and unleashes an unstoppable shot low into the middle of the goal. 1:0.
Tony Chapron has ended the first half by blowing the whistle.
The second half gets underway.
Jemerson (Monaco) uses bad language while talking to the referee and receives a yellow card for dissent.
The referee shows the yellow card to Almamy Toure (Monaco). Montpellier have been awarded a free kick.
Substitution. Rachid Ghezzal (Monaco) replaces Rony Lopes.
Michel Der Zakarian has decided to substitute Casimir Ninga and he is replaced by Souleymane Camara (Montpellier).
Jerome Roussillon (Montpellier) smacks a great volley at goal from inside the box, but sends the effort just wide of the left post.

Thomas Lemar (Monaco) attempted to create a dangerous situation in front of goal by sending a cross into the box, but the defence easily dealt with the threat. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Montpellier.
The manager makes a subsitution with Joao Moutinho (Monaco) coming on for Stevan Jovetic.
Gonzalez Piriz (Montpellier) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Paul Lasne.
Leonardo Jardim decides to make a substitution. Thomas Lemar will be replaced by Balde Keita (Monaco).
It's time for a substitution. Kevin Berigaud (Montpellier) comes on in place of Isaac Mbenza.
GOAL! Souleymane Camara (Montpellier) scores with a header from close range after Kevin Berigaud headed a pin-point lofted cross into his path. It's 1:1.
The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.
The referee blows his whistle and we are underway.
Yellow card! It's like Cedric Yambere (Dijon) was asking for a caution with his behaviour. Antony Gautier agrees and books him.
Ferland Mendy (Lyon) blows a big chance! He quickly whipped the ball from inside the box towards the net to beat the keeper, but his effort crashes against the left post.
The ball rebounds and lands at the feet of Nabil Fekir (Lyon) who scores with ease.
Mariano (Lyon) blows a chance to score! He pinged a fine header from deep inside the box towards the net, but his aim was off and it flew narrowly wide of the left post.

Ferland Mendy (Lyon) was trying to get to the ball but clattered into the legs of the opponent as well. Antony Gautier blows his whistle for an infringement. PENALTY to Dijon! Almost the entire opposition team is gathered around the referee and complaining. However, the decision has been made and it's final.
Goal! Anthony Lopes gets a hand on the penalty from Naim Sliti (Dijon), but can't stop it from flying inside the left post.
Antony Gautier shows a yellow card to Romain Amalfitano (Dijon) for his blatant foul.
Close! Bertrand Traore (Lyon) takes the resultant free kick from 20 metres out and his shot goes just over the crossbar.
The match has reached half-time.
Antony Gautier blows his whistle and the second half starts.
Mariano (Lyon) amazingly found his way through the defence, but lacked a precise finish as his effort from close range went slightly over the crossbar.
It's a goal! Xeka (Dijon) bursts into the box to get on the end of a whipped in cross from Fouad Chafik and scores magnificently from close range into the bottom right corner. 1:2.
Tanguy Ndombele (Lyon) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Antony Gautier had an easy-decision to make.
Baptiste Reynet (Dijon) picks up a yellow card for an infringement.
Houssem Aouar (Lyon) slots the ball inside the back of the net and alters the score!
Goal! Mariano (Lyon) puts the ball into the bottom left corner past the outstretched arm of Baptiste Reynet.
Olivier Dall'Oglio decides to make a substitution. Chang-Hoon Kwon will be replaced by Wesley Said (Dijon).
Perfectly taken free kick! Naim Sliti sends the ball in, Cedric Yambere (Dijon) manages to jump highest near the penalty spot and plants a cracking header low inside the left post. It's 3:3.
Substitution. Oussama Haddadi (Dijon) replaces Fouad Chafik.
Valentin Rosier (Dijon) commits a foul and is shown a yellow card without any hesitation from the referee.
The substitution has been made. Myziane Maolida (Lyon) has replaced Mariano.
Bruno Genesio has decided to make a change. Willem Geubbels (Lyon) replaces Lucas Tousart.
That will be all from Naim Sliti who is being replaced by the fresh legs of Frederic Sammaritano (Dijon).
Substitution. Houssem Aouar makes way for Clement Grenier (Lyon).
Yellow card. Wesley Said (Dijon) goes into the book for a bad tackle on his opponent.
That's the end of the match.
The first half has started.
Marquinhos (Paris SG) sees a yellow card from Clement Turpin after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.
The foul by Casimir Ninga (Montpellier) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Clement Turpin.
Clement Turpin shows a yellow card to Pedro Mendes (Montpellier) for a tough tackle.
The end of the first half.
The second half gets underway.
What a wasted chance that was! A precise cross into the box finds Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG), whose header goes wide of the goal.

Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) collects a brilliant pass inside the box and finds himself in a goal scoring opportunity. He takes a shot, but the effort is well blocked by one of the defending players. The ball is out of play. Paris SG win a corner kick.
Here is a change. Julian Draxler is going off and Unai Emery gives the last tactical orders to Lucas (Paris SG).
The substitution is prepared. Gonzalez Piriz (Montpellier) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Solomon Sambia.
Unai Emery prepares a substitution. Thomas Meunier is replaced by Dani Alves (Paris SG).
Substitution. Nordi Mukiele (Montpellier) has come on for Jerome Roussillon.
A yellow card for a tackle by Lucas (Paris SG). Clement Turpin doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
Unai Emery has decided to substitute Thiago Motta and he is replaced by Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG).
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Isaac Mbenza (Montpellier) comes onto the pitch for Casimir Ninga.
That's it for today, Clement Turpin has blown his whistle and the game is over.
Today's match has just started, enjoy the game!
GOAL! Stevan Jovetic (Monaco) gets to the ball on the edge of the box after a huge mistake by an opponent and slams it into the back of the net. He makes it 0:1.

Goal! Almamy Toure displays great vision and sends a pass to Rachid Ghezzal (Monaco), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball from close range in the back of the net. The score is 0:2.
That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.
The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.
Marcelo Bielsa has decided to make a substitution during the half-time break. Imad Faraj (Lille) comes on the pitch for Luiz Araujo.
Rony Lopes (Monaco) unleashes a promising shot towards the middle of the goal after his wonderful solo run, but Mike Maignan thwarts the effort with a fabulous save. The score remains the same.
An unlucky rebound falls to Falcao (Monaco) and he scores with a bullet header.
Anwar El-Ghazi (Lille) has to stretch for the ball in the box and sends it just wide of the left post.
The referee signals a substitution. Fares Bahlouli (Lille) is brought on as a substitute for Anwar El-Ghazi.
Frank Schneider rightly pulls out a yellow card and shows it to Rachid Ghezzal (Monaco).
Leonardo Jardim prepares a substitution. Stevan Jovetic is replaced by Adama Diakhaby (Monaco).

Fabinho (Monaco) and his stunning dribble! He zig-zags through the defence and gets in front of the keeper. He faints to shoot and then suddenly strikes goalwards, but his effort misses the target by a whisker. Very unlucky for Fabinho (Monaco). This could have been a legendary goal.
It's time for a substitution. Ezequiel Ponce (Lille) comes on in place of Yassine Benzia.
The foul by Jemerson (Monaco) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Frank Schneider.
Rominigue Kouame N'Guessan (Lille) commits a rough foul. Frank Schneider stops the game and makes a call. The referee blows his whistle and awards Monaco a penalty after chaos inside the box.
Goal! Falcao (Monaco) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past Mike Maignan into left side of the goal.
That will be all from Rachid Ghezzal who is being replaced by the fresh legs of Thomas Lemar (Monaco).
Leonardo Jardim has decided to substitute Falcao and he is replaced by Guido Carrillo (Monaco).
A yellow card for a tackle by Ezequiel Ponce (Lille). Frank Schneider doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
